userPromptForThisRevision: Paddle collisions aren't right, the ball slides along the paddle and isn't bouncing properly.

imageAssets.description: Stylized forest background for a Breakout game. Dark theme, muted greens and browns, subtle trees and foliage. Designed to be a background image, not distracting. Aspect ratio 16:9.
Stylized space background for a Breakout game. Dark theme, deep blues, purples, and blacks. Stars, maybe a subtle nebula or distant planet. Not too detailed. Aspect ratio 16:9.
Stylized dungeon wall background for a Breakout game. Dark theme, grey and brown stone textures. Cracks, maybe subtle moss or roots. Not too detailed. Aspect ratio 16:9.
Simple, dark, slightly stylized horizontal paddle sprite for a Breakout game. Clean design, maybe a subtle dark metallic or wood texture. Aspect ratio 4:1.
Simple, small, glowing sphere sprite for a Breakout game. Bright, contrasting color like electric blue or orange against a dark background. Aspect ratio 1:1.
Rectangular brick sprite for a Breakout game. Forest theme. Muted green and brown colors, subtle wood or leaf texture. Aspect ratio 2:1.
Rectangular brick sprite for a Breakout game. Space theme. Deep blue and purple colors, subtle metallic or tech texture. Aspect ratio 2:1.
Rectangular brick sprite for a Breakout game. Dungeon theme. Dark grey and brown colors, subtle stone texture. Aspect ratio 2:1.
Rectangular brick sprite for a Breakout game. Visually distinct from regular bricks, showing damage or being darker. Cracked stone or reinforced look. Aspect ratio 2:1.
Small icon for a Breakout power-up. Represents multiple balls. Simple, clear design on a dark background. Example: Three small circles. Aspect ratio 1:1.
Small icon for a Breakout power-up. Represents increasing paddle length. Simple, clear design on a dark background. Example: A horizontal bar with arrows pointing outwards. Aspect ratio 1:1.
Small icon for a Breakout power-up. Represents increasing ball speed. Simple, clear design on a dark background. Example: A ball with speed lines. Aspect ratio 1:1.
Small icon for a Breakout power-up. Represents a sticky paddle. Simple, clear design on a dark background. Example: A paddle with glue drips or a magnet. Aspect ratio 1:1.
Small icon for a Breakout power-up. Represents an extra life. Simple, clear design on a dark background. Example: A heart or a '1 Up'. Aspect ratio 1:1.
Small icon for a Breakout power-up. Represents destroying multiple bricks. Simple, clear design on a dark background. Example: An explosion or a bomb hitting bricks. Aspect ratio 1:1.
